Text: Alfred Boeddeker:  These programs, named by Father Boeddeker for Saint Anthony of Padua, include the St. Anthony Dining Room (1950), the St. Anthony Free Medical Clinic (1956), and the St. Anthony Farm, 315 acre near Petaluma in Sonoma County, California.

Text: Alfred Boeddeker:  The dining room and medical clinic are part of the St. Anthony Foundation.
